title: North vs South v1.3
description:
In the colorful strategy game The Bluecoats - North vs South, you play the head of one of the armies of the Civil War. Your aim is to conquer American territory ! 
 This is a remastered version of the game that was released in 1990, with improved graphics and user-friendliness that are up to current standards.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Capture the port to use the reinforcements coming from Europe.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Protect yourself from storms
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Be wary of those Indians in the war and those Mexican bandits ... if you don't, you'll be in trouble!


Instructions:

1.Install APK
2.Copy com.microids.google.bcnorthvssouth folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the game
